sentences.english: E. g. Many hardcore players do not consider themselves hardcore.
sentences.chinese: 许多游戏发烧友并不认为他们很发烧。

sentences.english: As an audio fancier, he has the experience of working in a recording studio.

sentences.english: Most classic music–manics are keen on Mozart.
sentences.chinese: 大多数古典音乐发烧友都喜欢莫扎特的作品。

sentences.english: Many hardware enthusiasts love to design and create unique cases for their computers.
sentences.chinese: 很多电脑发烧友喜欢为自己的电脑设计独特的机箱。
